channel.title: Jdk 7 paths?
channel.description:
just need soem help with the new classpaths and Paths for JDK 7 i tryed to do it but i messed it all up help please :]
Path--------------C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin; classpath----------------CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
System variables ClassPath-------------.;CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip
Path-----------C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Windows Live;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin;%SYSTEMROOT%\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\;C:\Program Files\Windows Live\Shared
see anything wrong????

item.description:

just need soem help with the new classpaths and Paths for JDK 7 i tryed to do it but i messed it all up help please :]
